detail_desc: Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Seam just above the knee and a flared flounce to the hem. Long at the back and slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Wide trousers in an airy weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt at the front. Straight legs with thigh-high slits. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a racer back.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a hood with an appliqué on top, zip down the front, patch front pockets and an elasticated hem. Lined.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.
Fabric cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in sturdy, striped organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons on the shoulders.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with gathers and covered buttons down to the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small decoration.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with deep armholes and wrapover slits in the sides. Integral sports bra with a racer back, narrow, crossover shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in a patterned stretch cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and short sleeves. Heart-shaped neckline, buttons at the front, a seam at the waist and smocking at the back. Unlined.
Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.
Bra tops in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with elastic hems. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and inset lace trims around the neckline and sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and a fake back pocket.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a frill trim around the neckline, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton and linen blend containing some Tencel™-lyocell. Resort collar, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Beret in soft, rib-knit cashmere with elasticated ribbing at the hem.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.

Dress in a sturdy weave with a sheen. Slightly deeper neckline at the back, short cap sleeves and pearly buttons at the back. Seam at the waist with a large, decorative bow and a voluminous skirt that is longer at the back. Lined.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details and a smart stretch function so that the shorts embrace the body for a comfortable and flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with a roll-edge neckline and long sleeves.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Slightly longer puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood lined with faux shearling. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and covered elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining and padding.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Cropped top in stretch jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length dungarees in cotton denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with wrapover draping at the front.
Shirt jacket in a sturdy linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood lined in waffled jersey. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.
Long-sleeved dresses in cotton jersey with a print motif and a seam at the hem with a gathered flounce.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, diagonal front pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Body in crushed velvet with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.

Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, pompom trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Covered buttons at the top, a wide, smocked seam at the waist and short, wide legs with lace-trimmed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and covered elastication at the hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Buttons at the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a pointelle pattern. Buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Strapless, microfibre body with a super push-up bra section. The body has a light sculpting effect on the waist and seat. The bra has underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, lace-trimmed hems and a lined gusset with press-studs. Shoulder straps included.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-neck. Narrow elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Gently flared dress in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with short puff sleeves. Unlined.
Short, wide cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons with loop fasteners down the front, and long sleeves. Narrow ribbing with a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized shirt dress in viscose twill with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped, diagonal front pockets and an inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in soft twill with front pockets and a high waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, and gently tapered legs.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Top with 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the sides for the best fit.

Pull-on trousers in a slightly stretchy, airy cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and a decorative bow and small embroidered detail at the front. Fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a decorative bow at the front. Lined gusset.
